findings.title: SWC-103 (Floating Pragma)
findings.description: The contract uses a floating pragma, which can lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: CW-012|SafeMath Override
findings.description: The contract uses SafeMath library for overflow protection, but it's not necessary in Solidity v0.8+.

findings.title: Insecure Use of tx.origin
findings.description: The contract uses tx.origin, which can be manipulated by hackers.

findings.title: Unrestricted Access to Critical Functions
findings.description: Only the owner should have access to critical functions.

findings.title: Code Readability and Complexity
findings.description: Multiple commented lines and unused imports should be removed for better code readability and reduced complexity.
